summary: This function retrieves the length of a $JavaLangCharSequence$.
returns: Return the number of characters in the string.
example-1: module Main in execution;%0A%0A@Start%0Adefun main (args : String[]) : void%0A{%0A    val message = %22Hello World!%22;%0A%0A    val size = F::len(message);%0A%0A    F::println(%22Size = %22 .. size);%0A}
